cnisp_vri.name: Health Infobase Canada - CNISP Viral Respiratory Infections
cnisp_vri.description: The Canadian Nosocomial Infection Surveillance Program (CNISP) tracks viral respiratory infections (VRI) among hospitalized patients in approximately 70 acute care hospitals across ten provinces and one territory. Data includes weekly hospitalization rates per 1,000 patient admissions for COVID-19, Influenza A, Influenza B, and RSV, stratified by age group (Adult, Pediatric, Overall). Additional COVID-19 metrics include ICU admission and in-hospital death rates. Hospital outbreak counts are also reported weekly starting January 2024. The number of reporting hospitals may differ by virus (approximately 60 for Influenza and RSV) and by metric (approximately 55 for age-stratified data).
